Title: The governance measurement of information system using framework cobit 5 in automotive company
Source title: Proceedings - 2017 International Conference on Applied Computer and Communication Technologies, ComCom 2017
Affiliations: Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jl. KebunJeruk Raya No. 27, Jakarta, 11530, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Harefa, K.R.P., Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jl. KebunJeruk Raya No. 27, Jakarta, 11530, Indonesia; Legowo, N., Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jl. KebunJeruk Raya No. 27, Jakarta, 11530, Indonesia
Abstract: This research conducted to the measurement and evaluation of IT management in Automotive Company. The objective of this research is performing the measurement and evaluation to the IT governance in the area of Toyota Plaza. The measurement used the COBIT 5 framework by Process Assessment Model (PAM) method. The approach utilized the primer data which are collected by interview and questioners, and secondary data by observation and document stages. The result of this research shows that most of the capability level processes of IT governance at Automotive Company are at Level 1 (performed) they are 7 processes (EDM02, APO02, APO04, BAI08, BAI09, DSS03, DSS04) and Level 2 (managed), they are 2 processes (APO07, BAI04). The conclusion of this research shows most of the process perform capability level at present (as is) is in the level 1 (performed). © 2017 IEEE.
Author Keywords: Automotive company; COBIT 5 framework; COBIT process assessment model (PAM); IT governance
Index Keywords: Information use; Automotive companies; COBIT 5 framework; IT governance; IT management; Level 2; Level process; Process assessments; Secondary datum; Public policy
References: Bourgeois, D.T., (2014) Information Systems for Business and beyond; Bowen, P.L., Cheung, M.D., Rohde, F.H., (2007) Enhancing IT Governance Practices : A Model and Case Study of An Organizations Efforts, 8, pp. 191-221; Firmansyah, M.R., (2015) Analisis Penerapan Tata Kelola Tehnologi Informasi Menggunakan Cobit 5.0 di Perusahaan (Studi Kasus PT Kereta Api Indonesia; (2012) A Business Framework for the Governance and Management of Enterprise IT, , ISACA; (2008) International Standard ISO/IEC., 2008, , ISO-IEC 38500; (2007) Executive Summary Framework, , ITGI; (2012) COBIT Steering Committee, , ITGI
